title: Knives Out (2019)
description: A masterclass in detective methodology. When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate, Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate.

title: Murder on the Orient Express (2017)
description: An essential study in interrogation techniques. When a murder occurs on the train on which detective Hercule Poirot is traveling, he is called upon to investigate.

title: Gone Girl (2014)
description: A rare glimpse into the psychology of deception. When Nick Dunne reports that his wife Amy has gone missing, media attention and public scrutiny threaten to unravel his perfect image.
